title: In Search of Green Cobb PSA A-2
author: Ct94122

posts.post_title: In Search of Green Cobb PSA A-2
posts.post_content:
I am in search of a T206 Green Cobb PSA Authentic- 2.  It would need to be a trade / cash combo.  I have many cards / mostly PSA slabbed.  

I’m a good guy and love cards- put off this card for 18 years and regret it.  

Please message me if you have one for consideration.  

Cris
